# pyM17

> **DEPRECATED**: This project is no longer actively maintained.

---

## Status

This codebase has been deprecated and is no longer receiving updates or bug fixes.

## What's Next

A new, modern version of this project is currently in development. The upcoming release will feature:

- Improved architecture and performance
- Better documentation
- Enhanced compatibility
- Updated M17 API and protocol support

## Recommendations

- **New users**: Please wait for the new version before starting new projects with this library.
- **Existing users**: This code will remain available for reference, but migration to the new version is recommended once it becomes available.

## More Information

For updates on the new version, check back here or visit the [M17 Project](https://m17project.org/).
